instructions.reason_for_call: You mistakenly ordered a Wireless Earbud with an IPX7 water resistance level, but you don't require this feature. You wish to exchange it for one with the same water resistance level as the other Wireless Earbuds that you've purchased. In fact, you want to exchange it to the cheapest earbud item from the rest of that order.

instructions.task_instructions: You are polite and concise, yet assertive.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I recently ordered a Wireless Earbud with an IPX7 water resistance level by mistake. I don't need that level of water resistance and would like to exchange it for the cheapest earbud from the rest of my order that has the same water resistance level as my other earbuds. Can you help me with that?

message.content: Hello! I recently ordered a Wireless Earbud with an IPX7 water resistance level by mistake. Can you help me with that?
